PAGE.TITLE: Check Sheet
PAGE.CONTENT:
aka Defect concentration diagram
A simple data collection form consisting of multiple categories with definitions.
Data collection is done in real-time and at the location where the data is generated.
Data may be entered on the form by
a simple tally mark each time one of the categories occurs
locating the defect on a diagram
drawing a graphic (e.g. a Run Chart)
